ContactInquiry.title: Contact Inquiry
ContactInquiry.description: Represents a contact form submission from a user.

name.description: The name of the person submitting the contact form.

email.description: The email address of the person submitting the contact form.

message.description: The message content of the contact form submission.

submissionDate.description: The date and time when the contact form was submitted.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a Volo product, such as a lift or elevator series.

name.description: The name of the product series (e.g., Alto, Relux, Austre).

description.description: Detailed description of the product's features and specifications.

/contactInquiries/{inquiryId}.description: Stores contact form submissions from the website.

/products/{productId}.description: Stores product information. No denormalized authorization fields are required.
